scripts.auth0:setup: cp -n a0deploy-cli.sample.config.json a0deploy-cli.config.json || echo --- Config file already exists. Skipped copy...
scripts.setup:cert: mkdir -p dev && openssl req -nodes -new -x509 -keyout dev/server.key -out dev/server.cert -subj '/CN=start-dashboard'
scripts.setup:env: cp -n sample.env .env || echo .env file already exists. Skipping...
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:cert && npm run setup:hosts
scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:ui && npm run install:blocks
scripts.build: cd react-ui/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run start:ui' 'PORT=8080 npm run start:server'
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm start
